hymn.title: There in old Chaldea, product of man's fall

layout.singingstanza: There in old Chal -- de -- a, pro -- duct of man's fall, God ap -- peared to A -- bram— called him from it all. "Get thee from thy coun -- try, from thy fath -- er's clan, Get thee from thy kin -- dred to an -- oth -- er land." Our Lord God Je -- ho -- vah called a cor -- porate man, One that would ex -- press Him and ful -- fill His plan.

lyrics.stanza: There in old Chaldea, product of man's fall, God appeared to Abram—called him from it all. "Get thee from thy country, from thy father's clan, Get thee from thy kindred to another land."
Our Lord God Jehovah called a corporate man, One that would express Him and fulfill His plan.
Through the Lord's infusion, Abraham became Father of the faithful—life had changed his name. Though the Lord's appearing, brought him to the land, Still he needed Isaac to fulfill God's plan.
Isaac from his father did inherit all: Sonship's full enjoyment, blessing of God's call. Though all things receiving, incomplete was he; Lacking transformation and maturity.
Thus do Jacob, Isaac, Abraham portray Path that we, God's called ones, must walk in today: Members of the Body, as a corporate man, We complete His calling and fulfill His plan.
